author: assaf
msg: Change: Buildr now uses Jekyll to generate Web site/documentation:
http://github.com/mojombo/jekyll/ This replaces Docter so less code to
maintain and the same Textile/Liquid mechanism as when using Github
This is an empty revision for padding.

author: assaf
msg: Added PDF generation. Added a preface page for the general table of contents and otherwise using the wonderful powers of Prince to merge pages together and rewrite links so we won't have to.
